definition: Hertz (name)/Heinrich Hertz (1857-1894), German physicist and meteorologist, pioneer of electromagnetic radiation
awe-inspiring/abbr. for 赫茲|赫兹[he4 zi1], hertz (Hz)

sentences.english: For the speaker, the sensitivity at 1KHz and average sensitivity should be tested.
sentences.chinese: 測試耳機在1K赫茲時的靈敏度和平均靈敏度。

sentences.english: By applying "slit method", the beam width of THz wave was measured.
sentences.chinese: 利用“狹縫法“測量了太赫茲光束的束寬。

sentences.english: Permancet magnet DC motor, 220V, 50Hz, single phase.
sentences.chinese: 永磁直流電機，220伏，50赫茲，單相。
請注意800赫茲以上的統一性。

sentences.english: The oscilloscope bandwidth set at 20MHz with co-axial probe.
sentences.chinese: 示波器帶寬設爲20兆赫茲，同軸探頭。

sentences.english: You are taking the weekly LA257 to Oceanside's Hertz Yard.
sentences.chinese: 您正在服用的每週LA257以歐辛塞德的赫茲場。

sentences.english: So I can in a very straightforward way say, OK, well, here is my Helmholtz free energy.
sentences.chinese: 所以我可以很直接的說，這就是我的亥姆赫茲自由能。

sentences.english: Analogue bandwidth is measured in Hertz Hz, cycles per second.
sentences.chinese: 類比式頻寬以赫茲測量每秒的傳送週期。

sentences.english: Hz was shot with a spy camera that was placed inside the artist's mouth.
sentences.chinese: 赫茲在藝術家的嘴裏面安置的一架間諜照像機拍攝的。

sentences.english: Frequency is measured in hertz , or cycles per second.
sentences.chinese: 頻率用赫茲即每秒鐘的週數來計算。

sentences.english: The ideal frequency is that of 50 hertz.
sentences.chinese: 最爲理想的頻率是50赫茲。

sentences.english: Frequency of impulses should be regulated in range from 5 to 120 Hz.
sentences.chinese: 衝動的頻率應該加以管理，範圍從5到120赫茲。

sentences.english: The infrasonic wave is one kind of frequency is lower than 20 hertz sound waves.
sentences.chinese: 次聲波是一種頻率低於20赫茲的聲波。

sentences.english: Recent development of terahertz science and technology.
sentences.chinese: 太赫茲科學技術的新發展。

pinyin: Bei3 Ka3 luo2 lai2 na4 zhou1

definition: range of values/category defined by a range of values (tier, bracket, stratum etc)
